title: Honeyed duck confit with crispy seaweed and creamy mash
description: Confit is a great way of keeping the duck fresh - in an airtight kilner type jar, they will keep for a couple of months in the fridge.  The fat can be reserved and used for cooking - especially for your Sunday roast potatoes!
ingredients: 2 duck legs, confited in their own fat, homemade or from a can or jar
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
